pli-tv-pvr3:2.4: This renders _tesaṁ sabhāgadhammānaṁ_. The point seems to be that the names _anicca_, etc., mentioned above, are not even known if a Buddha does nor arise.

pli-tv-pvr3:8.1: [Sp.5.257](): _Sambhedaṃ nidānañcaññanti aññampi sambhedañca nidānañca. Tattha sambhedavacanena samuṭṭhānasambhedassa gahaṇaṃ paccetabbaṃ, tāni hi tīṇi sikkhāpadāni ṭhapetvā sesāni sambhinnasamuṭṭhānāni. Nidānavacanena sikkhāpadānaṃ paññattidesasaṅkhātaṃ nidānaṃ paccetabbaṃ_, “ .”
